description: Navigate to Apotek Cempaka Putih. Head south along the street, passing a blue building with XL branding on the right. Continue straight for approximately 27 meters. The destination, Apotek Cempaka Putih, is located on the left side, marked by a vertical sign near a yellow kiosk.
